IndicatorDesc: Proportion of children aged 1-17 years who experienced any physical punishment and/or psychological aggression by caregivers in the past month
SeriesDesc: Proportion of children aged 1-14 years who experienced physical punishment and/or psychological aggression by caregivers in last month (% of children aged 1-14 years)
